description.brief: Orogen components for reprojection of data sources onto other data. E.g. for colorizing pointclouds and other features.

package.description: This library contains tasks for reprojecting and merging data sources. Examples are the colorizing of pointclouds from an image, or the homography reprojection of camera images to get a virtual view.
package.author: Jakob Schwendner/jakob.schwendner@dfki.de
